alert.note: Alert for Eastern Foot Hills; Northern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 08 at 3:03AM MDT until September 08 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: .A trough crossing the area today will bring an abrupt shift to breezy northwesterly winds while relative humidity values remain low. This will lead to widespread critical fire weather conditions across much of western and central SD into southern portions of northeastern WY from late morning through the afternoon. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 323 AND 324... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 323 Northern Foot Hills and 324 Eastern Foot Hills. * WINDS...Northwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 percent. * IMPACTS...The combination of gusty winds and low relative humidity would produce critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Foot Hills; Northern Foot Hills
